description: UX/UI design fundamentals and design systems

nodes.name: Visual Hierarchy
nodes.description: Size, contrast, weight, spacing, proximity â€” directing attention through composition
challenge_hooks: Why does a large, low-contrast element lose to a small, high-contrast one for attention?
How does proximity create grouping without explicit borders?
When does symmetry hurt usability?

nodes.name: Typography & Scale
nodes.description: Type scale, line height, measure, font pairing, hierarchy through type
challenge_hooks: What is the ideal line length (measure) for body text and why?
Why does a modular scale create more harmonious type hierarchy than arbitrary sizes?
When would you use a serif vs sans-serif for UI text?

nodes.name: Color Theory
nodes.description: Hue/saturation/lightness, contrast ratios, color models, accessible palettes, semantic color
challenge_hooks: What WCAG contrast ratio is required for normal body text?
Why is HSL more intuitive than RGB for creating color scales?
How do you create a color palette that works for both light and dark modes?

nodes.name: Design Tokens
nodes.description: Primitive vs semantic tokens, token naming, theming, platform translation
challenge_hooks: What is the difference between a primitive token and a semantic token?
Why should a semantic token like `color.button.background` reference a primitive rather than a raw value?
How do design tokens enable a design system to support multiple themes?

nodes.name: Component Composition
nodes.description: Atomic design, slots/compound components, controlled vs uncontrolled, API design for components
challenge_hooks: What makes a component API reusable vs prescriptive?
When would you use a compound component pattern vs a prop-based API?
What's the tradeoff between controlled and uncontrolled components?

nodes.name: Accessibility & WCAG
nodes.description: WCAG 2.1/3.0, ARIA, keyboard patterns, focus management, screen reader compatibility
challenge_hooks: When should you use role='button' on a div vs an actual <button>?
What is the difference between aria-label, aria-labelledby, and aria-describedby?
How do you make a custom dropdown keyboard-accessible?

nodes.name: Interaction Design & Motion
nodes.description: Affordances, feedback, animation principles, microinteractions, loading states
challenge_hooks: What is an affordance and how does skeuomorphism use it?
When does animation improve UX vs when does it harm it?
What are the 12 principles of animation and which apply most to UI?

nodes.name: Responsive & Adaptive Design
nodes.description: Fluid grids, breakpoints, container queries, mobile-first, intrinsic design
challenge_hooks: What is the difference between responsive and adaptive design?
Why does mobile-first CSS result in less code than desktop-first?
When are container queries more useful than media queries?
